p: Carvacrol and timol, which are phenol monoterpenes present in the EOs of oregano and thyme, have shown an antiproliferative property in the cultured cells of several types of tumors such as lung, liver, and colon cancers [ 83]. The genus of Mentha have also been shown to have many biological activities, and especially anti-tumoral activity. Many studies have demonstrated the effect of Mentha species EOs as inhibiting the cell proliferation of numerous tumor cells by acting on mitochondrial dysfunctions, apoptosis induction, and autophagy processes [ 84].
